title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects, I encounter an issue. I don't understand the error message that is displayed.
OB: When I open the scoped type hierarchy for a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.' I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
EB: I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when opening the scoped type hierarchy for a binary project.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant). 2. Go to the scoped type hierarchy. 3. Observe the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
